caller_intent: Tim from Sharp Business wanted to set up automated meter and toner reporting for a copier, seeking assistance with remote software configuration and troubleshooting.
resolution_steps: Cecilia guided Tim to access a remote support site (sos.splashtop.com) to download the Blastop SOS app.
Tim provided a 9-digit key to establish a secure connection for remote diagnostics.
They discussed potential barriers, including password-protected computers and admin access requirements.
Cecilia confirmed no software installation was needed, as settings were adjusted remotely to enable automated reporting.
Email notifications for toner replacement and meter updates were configured.
knowledge_required: Email notification setup for toner/meter alerts
summary: Cecilia assisted Tim in configuring automated copier reporting via remote access, resolving potential software barriers, and setting up email alerts for toner and meter updates. The issue was resolved without requiring software installation.
